name: INCarAudioSource
desc: Constants indicating the source of audio.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: case sourceAUX
items.desc: A source connected through an auxiliary jack.

items.name: case sourceUSB
items.desc: A source connected through a USB plug.

items.name: case sourceOpticalDrive
items.desc: An optical drive source such as a CD or DVD.
